text: Tasnova Hoque Elvin (; born 26 April 1990) better known as Tasnova Elvin is a Bangladeshi actress and model. Tasnova Elvin began her journey in showbiz as a top 15 contestant in Lux Channel I Superstar 2010, but soon broke out as an actor with her charming on-screen presence. She is currently working on many popular television tele-drama including Bachelor Point, Kacher Putul, Khandani Manzil and Mr Tension. ==Early life== Elvin was born on 26 April in Brahmanbaria, Bangladesh. She completed her Bachelor of Business Administration from American International University-Bangladesh. Her father is a businessman and mother is a housewife. ==Career== Elvin started her career with television advertisement Pran Mango Juice Pack. In 2013, she made her acting debut in the Bengali drama Room Date. ==Personal life== Elvin is married to Fahad Reazi Since 26 March 2017. ==Filmography== ===TV dramas and telefilms=== ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:Living people Category:1990 births Category:Bangladeshi actresses Category:Bangladeshi female models Category:Bengali television actresses Category:People from Brahmanbaria district Category:American International University-Bangladesh alumni
title: Tasnova Hoque Elvin
